formattedAddress: 566 W 151st St, New York, NY 10031, USA
adrFormatAddress: 566 W 151st St, New York, NY 10031, USA

originalText.text: Had my beard shaped here by Steve, and I MUST say not only did he give me an amazing trim and shape up, but we also had a great conversation! Friendly attention to detail and a great clean shop. I highly recommend this salon.

text.text: Had my beard shaped here by Steve, and I MUST say not only did he give me an amazing trim and shape up, but we also had a great conversation! Friendly attention to detail and a great clean shop. I highly recommend this salon.

originalText.text: Steve gives excellent haircuts; he was able to provide exactly what I was looking for based on a couple of photographs that I showed him. As a bonus, Steve is a great conversationalist with a colorful professional background and diverse interests/hobbies. On the other hand, if silence during your haircuts is your jam, Steve is sensitive enough to perceive this and is totally receptive of it. I highly recommend.

text.text: Steve gives excellent haircuts; he was able to provide exactly what I was looking for based on a couple of photographs that I showed him. As a bonus, Steve is a great conversationalist with a colorful professional background and diverse interests/hobbies. On the other hand, if silence during your haircuts is your jam, Steve is sensitive enough to perceive this and is totally receptive of it. I highly recommend.

originalText.text:
This barbershop/salon was recommended to me by a friend who has used Steve's services for years. At first, I was skeptical of changing barbers, especially in light of the pandemic and my concerns around cleanliness,  together with health and safety concerns.  The latter was the reason why I was in search of a new stylist. Needless to say, I was totally blown away.  The interior design of the shop bode well for the community it resides in.  The texture of the place is a blend of a traditional salon with a modern twist.  The environment is very welcoming, cozy, but more importantly, clean. I first walked in expecting to be served, but was advised by Steve that an appointment had to be made.  This was in large part because of his commitment to adhere to the health and safety concerns of his clients.  Steve wants to make certain that social distancing was followed and did not want unscheduled patrons to wait in the salon.

When I returned the following day, I was please to see that I didn't have to wait. My beard taper was expertly cut. My son also received a haircut. He got his traditional skin fade with a half moon.  In all of my years of taking him to a barber, I've never been more impressed. Steve has earned our business moving forward. I'm so glad I found a great place for my hair styling needs and will be a faithful patron for years to come.

originalText.text: Clean, spacious and professional atmosphere. The Salon is beautiful but nothing tops the haircut. Quality, Quality, Quality!!! Steve the Barber is skilled, consistent and a master at his craft. Celebrities, athletes, businessmen and women are his regulars and so am I.  The service is impeccable. Works by appointment only so your time is reserved and you walk in and get amazing service from the very start. Be ready for repeated compliments from strangers the moment you get off his chair and start walking down the street.

originalText.text: Steve Darius is the most professional barber I've ever dealt with. Shop is always clean and the service is top-shelf. I've been going to Steve for the past 3 years and I have never been disappointed in the quality of service him and his staff provides. If you are in need of a quality, clean, professional salon, this is the answer to your prayers...AAA+++
